page.title: 16A PUPIL'S DAY.
page.content: {A Report by Kim Saunders I got up about 8.00am, got dressed and had my breakfast.This was a slice of toast and a cup of tea.Then I got ready for school.My dad put my bike in the trailer of his car,so that I could cycle home,and then he took me to school.If it looked like rain he said he would come and pick me up.When I got to school I put my bike with all the other children's.I hung my bag and coat up in the cloakroom and then went into the playground until the bell rang.When it did,I went into the classroom and did some English until we finished registration and went to assembly. Mr.Yeomans our class teacher read a story and then we sang"Praise the Lord".We went back to class and read and did English until it was time for break.After break we did mathematics until our swimming period.
